name: Console Tetris (Osicat)
description:
Lets keep things simple.

What is it?

This game is somehow my interpretation of good old beloved Tetris. It is fully playable inside of your everyday-use Windows Command Prompt aka cmd.exe.

Tetris?

I am not gonna really explain it further than Tetris. Tetris. That's it, you stack Tetrominos on top of each other, they get happy when everyone is at the party, they go home. Or something.

Controls?

Controls I went with are the ones I got used to when playing Tetris Online Poland (TOP).

  • Side arrows to move tetrominos to the sides
  • Up arrow / Left control to rotate tetrominos
  • Down arrow to soft drop
  • Space to hard drop
  • Left shift to hold tetromino
Notes

I you are fancy playing with some music, make sure to drop the music of your choosing named as music.mp3 to the same folder, that the exe file is in.
